HTML5 - About Content - Example

		
<div onclick="">
	click
</div>

Browsers don’t know what to do with it: div is a non-semantic tag, it has no intrinsic behavior, nor explains the nature of the content. Browser don’t know it is a button, even if you make it look like one via CSS. And we have to rely on a js function to say it is clickable and that there’s an action behind it.
